page.title: 02DAY IN LIFE OF PAUL LOFTUS
page.content: On{May Day 1985}I went to the{Dyke, with my mates. I had{a swim,}but Lee and Craig didn't, because it was cold. After the swim we went back to the{ {Tarzan Swing}in the{wood,}which is a rope on a tree. When we arrived, we started by pushing each other, but then we spun each other. After a while we set off home. On the way we played a game in the{Rape {Field.}I hid and Lee ran at me, but as he was about to jump on me he fell and all we could hear was Lee saying,{"Ow {me 'and." Craig then laughed but Lee said,{ {"Shurrup it isn't funny."} We went up the slope until we reached the top of the{"Hillies"}and home.
